snippet: Scores of people were killed as about 11 inches of rain, about three months’ worth, fell in a short period on the Black Sea coast.
lead_paragraph: Scores of people were killed as about 11 inches of rain, about three months’ worth, fell in a short period on the Black Sea coast.

headline.seo: Fatal Flooding in Southern Russia After Heavy Rain
headline.main: Heavy Rain in Southern Russia Brings Deadly Flash Floods
headline.print_headline: Heavy Rain in Southern Russia Brings Deadly Flash Floods
